text: Phoenix is a French alternative rock band that was Grammy awarded. It consists of Thomas Mars (vocals), Deck D'Arcy (bass) and Laurent Brancowitz and Christian Mazzalai who play guitar. They are related to Air and Daft Punk. ==Discography== *United (2000) *Alphabetical (2004) *It's Never Been Like That (2006) *Wolfgang Amadeus Phoenix (2009) *"Bankrupt!" (2013) ==References== Category:Alternative rock bands Category:French musical groups Category:1999 establishments in France
title: Phoenix (band)
